snippet: C. C. Sabathia pitched three regrettable innings in the Yankees’ 3-2 preseason loss Tuesday, but said he was in a better position at this point in camp than he was last year.
abstract: Washington Nationals beat New York Yankees, 3-2, in preseason game; starting Yankees pitcher C C Sabathia brushes off poor performance in three innings.
lead_paragraph: C. C. Sabathia pitched three regrettable innings in the Yankees’ 3-2 preseason loss Tuesday, but said he was in a better position at this point in camp than he was last year.

headline.main: Sabathia Is Encouraged by an Outing, in Part Because It’s Only March
headline.print_headline: Sabathia Is Encouraged by an Outing, in Part Because It’s Only March
